name: FUEL Bitcentral
author: Bitcentral

sections.description:
The FUEL Plugin for WordPress was designed to make ingesting FUEL assets into WP relatively simple and reliable. It can be configured to automatically publish “posts” on your site in a ‘set it and forget’ model. FUEL videos assets that have titles [headlines] that translate to the web and whose selected thumbnails are relevant to the story can be published automatically to a web page using one of several ‘short codes’.

3rd Party or external service

The plugin uses our third party script to run the FUEL player;

https://fuel-streaming-prod01.fuelmedia.io/player/v3/fuel.js

This is our website for the FUEL asset.

https://streamingfuel.com/

Our Privacy Policy

https://bitcentral.com/privacy-policy/
sections.installation: Install the Fuel-Bitcentral plugin to your WordPress website. Activate the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Release Date – 1 June 2020

  • Add Option to manage styles for sharing script.

1.2

Release Date – 19 June 2020

  • Add option to manage tiles ordering according to the MRSS attribute. Please see the screenshots 8 to 11.

1.3

Release Date – 27 Sep 2021

  • Fixed Some Warning Issues After Updates Of Dependant plugins.

1.4

Release Date – 14 Oct 2021

  • Fixed Issue to Check ACF/ACF Pro Plugin Activation.

1.5

Release Date – 14 Jan 2022

  • Updated the FUEL Player Source Script.
  • Merged Pre-Roll Ads Functionality into FUEL Plugin. No longer needed to use pre-roll addon separately.
  • Added the FUEL Title, Media URL and Embed code attributes into tag.
  • Changed settings of Player Audio Control in global settings and introduced the new shortcode attributes

1.6

Release Date – 31 Jan 2023

  • Remove WPAllImport Plugin Dependency.
  • Added FUEL Importer into FUEL Plugin. No longer needed to use WPAllImport plugin separately.
  • Added FUEL Shortcode Generator and Added in the Editor area.

1.7

Release Date – 3 Mar 2023

  • Apply pagination on FUEL post selection popup.
  • Fix Image importing bug in FUEL Importer

1.8

Release Date – 15 Mar 2023

  • Add author in FUEL posts generated by XML
  • Restructure the WP Cron for MRSS feed.

1.9

Release Date – 31 Mar 2023

  • Fix player share option.

2.0

Release Date – 10 Apr 2023

  • Sync FUEL Settings Sound Option Field With Shortcode Generator Field.

2.1

Release Date – 18 Apr 2023

  • Fixed some bugs in share function.

2.2

Release Date – 16 June 2023

  • Change algorithm for update or add new fuel posts from MRSS.
  • Provide an option to set the fuel post status during import.
  • Provide an option to manage pre-roll ad for specific fuel video.
  • Implement data migration.

2.3

Release Date – 14 Aug 2023

  • Remove The Migration Script.
  • Define category variable method in fuel ad url.
  • Show MRSS feed title and link on FUEL post listing page in admin.
  • Fix the FUEL Post description issue in shortcode.
  • Render FUEL post on front-end via shortcodes even if the post status is set to draft.

2.4

Release Date – 16 Aug 2023

  • Provide the MRSS Cron setting management in FUEL Importer.
  • Provide necessary columns to see the cron data in FUEL Importer.
  • Provide necessary columns to see FUEL MRSS in FUEL Post Type.
  • Handle the cron recurrence smartly.

2.5

Release Date – 30 Aug 2023

  • Fix some minor bugs.

2.6

Release Date – 6 Sep 2023

  • Fix some minor bugs.

2.7

Release Date – 18 Oct 2023

  • Fix the category tag issue.

2.8

Release Date – 25 Oct 2023

  • Fix the duplication issue.

2.9

Release Date – 6 Nov 2023

  • Modified the CRON Job handler.

3.0

Release Date – 2 Jan 2024

  • Fix date order issue.
  • Fix Vast Url Category Rendering Issue.

3.1

Release Date – 14 Mar 2024

  • Modify the ad url and add placements.

3.2

Release Date – 29 Mar 2024

  • Bug Fixes.

short_description: FUEL plugin imports fuel videos via MRSS feed and displays them on the front-end through short codes for its users.
